title: Ricardo
text: Ricardo is the <a href="Spanish%20language">Spanish</a> and <a href="Portuguese%20language">Portuguese</a> cognate of the name <a href="Richard">Richard</a>. It derived from <a href="Proto-Germanic%20language">Proto-Germanic</a> "*rīks" 'king, ruler' + "*harduz" "hard, brave'. It may be a given name, or a <a href="surname">surname</a>.
